article_title: 'My children cling to me as dogs raid graves near our shelter'
sentence: Domestic  pets  whose  owners  are  dead  or  displaced,  mixed  with  Rafah's  existing  population  of  strays,  all  of  them  now  feral  and  scavenging  for  whatever  they  can  eat.

article_title: 'My children cling to me as dogs raid graves near our shelter'
sentence: The  cemetery  has  numerous  shallow  graves  where  people  place  their  dead  until  a  time  comes  when  they  can  be  taken  to  their  home  area.

article_title: 'My children cling to me as dogs raid graves near our shelter'
sentence: On  some  graves  relatives  have  placed  bricks  to  try  to  keep  the  dogs  away  from  the  dead.

article_title: 'My children cling to me as dogs raid graves near our shelter'
sentence: My  child  is  in  the  3rd  grade  and  today  instead  of  playing  a  game  he  was  drawing  a  grave  and  in  the  middle  he  drew  a  dead  body.
